mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PRPROCESS.CAAE_PROJECT
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS rowno FROM (SELECT t.* FROM PRPROCESS.CAAE_PROJECT t
ORDER BY audit_status, last_update desc) tt WHERE ROWNUM <= ${end}) table_alias WHERE table_alias.rowno >= ${start}
select trad_institution_id,trad_institution_name from prprocess.caae_project group by trad_institution_id,trad_institution_name
